title: üì¢ New RCD Installation Requirements in Australia! üí°
text: Starting May 1st, 2023: Type AC RCDs must not be installed in new installations. Type AC RCDs must not be installed in new sub-circuits. Type AC RCDs must not be installed in alterations to existing sub-circuits...
